agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-038: Implement failure injection system. Created FailureInjector class with FailureType enum, FailureConfig dataclass, ScheduledFailure for timed failures, injectFailure/clearFailure/clearAllFailures/scheduleFailure methods. 59 tests passing. Syntax check passes.

agents.name: Agent2
agents.note: Completed US-040: Add simulator configuration to config.json. Added simulator section to obd_config.json with enabled, profilePath, scenarioPath, connectionDelaySeconds, updateIntervalMs, failures subsection. Implemented validation and helper functions in obd_config_loader.py. 32 new tests (78 total). Syntax check passes.

agents.name: Agent3
agents.note: Completed US-037: Create DriveScenario system. Implemented DrivePhase/DriveScenario dataclasses, DriveScenarioRunner with smooth transitions and callbacks, built-in scenarios (cold_start, city_driving, highway_cruise, full_cycle), loadScenario for custom JSON. 62 tests passing. Syntax check passes.
